meanings.definition: A container for holding liquids or food.
meanings.sent1: I poured water into the kan.
meanings.sent2: The kan on the table was filled with fruits.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the kan, spilling its contents.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled out like water from a tipped kan.
meanings.sent5: The shiny kan gleamed in the sunlight, inviting thirsty travelers.

meanings.definition: To be able to; have the ability to.
meanings.sent1: I kan lift this box easily.
meanings.sent2: She kan run fast in the race.
meanings.sent3: Even with his eyes closed, he kan find his way home.
meanings.sent5: With practice, you kan master any skill you choose.

meanings.definition: A unit of measurement equal to 1,000 liters.
meanings.sent1: The farmer stored grain in a large kan.
meanings.sent2: The brewery ordered a kan of malt for brewing.
meanings.sent3: The chef needed a kan of milk for the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The swimming pool required several kans of water to fill.
meanings.sent5: The ship carried kans of oil for the long journey.
